website_summaries.verdict: Unique in color, material, and structure, this fun muffin pan from Farberware is a quality piece for any kitchen.
pros: Nonstick interior is free of PFOA
Interior is quilted for more even baking
cons: Pan must be washed by hand

customer_reviews.title: I loved this pan when I first got it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pan when I first got it. However, now that I've owned it for nine months, I can tell you that overtime it lost its non-stick quality. I bake eggs in it every week and even with olive oil or ghee brushed into the cups, trying to get the eggs out is a disaster now. And unfortunately the pretty teal finish is now coming off in some of the cups and I can see a bronze color underneath. Hopefully that finish isn't ending up in my eggs. That's the opposite of what I was looking for when I chose this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amy I

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pan less than 2 months and I have found bits of the finish in my cooked food. Gross!! No warranty what so ever on it, so I basically wasted my money as they will not let me exchange it or return it. Terrible these days how things are handled. Waste of money and time!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arizonaqueen

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic? Nonstick? NEVER AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: While I thought this was a great purchase at the time...I've had it less than a year and it's been used probably a dozen times. Surprise, the coating came off on muffins and left uncoated spots on the bottom of the tin. YUCK!
customer_reviews.author: Mom Moyer

customer_reviews.title: We Love These Pans!
customer_reviews.text: We take muffins seriously around our house! We wanted to replace some pans that definitely needed to go. The finish on these pans is great and it's super easy to clean up when we're done. The curled edges are tight and I haven't seen any rust anywhere. We do hand wash them, so that helps a lot. I would recommend these pans to anybody who is looking for a good replacement to some tired pans. We ended up getting another one so we could outfit a cupcake party!
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Nice but hand wash only
customer_reviews.text: I really like this muffin tin and though you do need to spray it if not using liners, it does clean up well. I've used mine only twice so far but it cooked evenly, cleaned up brilliantly and I am very pleased. I will suggest though that for longevity, you do not put it in the dishwasher or use any kind of abrasive product.
customer_reviews.author: momof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Work great !
customer_reviews.text: Work great easy to clean and no chemical smell whatsoever. They do look like they’re easy to scratch but we’ll see with time and wear. Overall good value !
customer_reviews.author: Lyss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cupcakes
customer_reviews.text: I make a lot of cupcakes and this is my favorite pan! I do wish it wasn’t quite as expensive so I could have bought a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie F

customer_reviews.title: Wow this Faberware pan is super easy
customer_reviews.text: I used this and the cookie sheet and was wow'd by ease of cleaning and using no spray on the surfaces. I recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: jMajor

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty muffin pan... in an absolutely gorgeous color! I will never have plain baking pans ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Dormido

customer_reviews.title: Coating comes off on food
customer_reviews.text: In less than a year of one time per week use, the coating started coming off on our muffins. Shocking! These are a big problem!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara C. Loius

customer_reviews.title: No exception. ......
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered a few products like this and am still happy with them . This one is no exception . I would order it again ! Definitely recommend it !

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I make tarts at Christmas, they were always hard to remove from my muffin tins., and a pain to clean the tins. These are fantastic, tarts were easy to remove and tins were so simple to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cupcake pan!

customer_reviews.text: Best pans ever! Food slides right out and they are so cute! I bought it for the colors and was surprised what a great product it was! Great purchase! And super easy to clean!

customer_reviews.text: I’d buy a thousand if I could. It works so well and the color is amazing. I hand wash it and dry it immediately and the pan has held up like new.

customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! The muffins cook perfect and pop right out! This is a fabulous product.

customer_reviews.title: Longer days and better health and well-being.
customer_reviews.text: I've pre-washed but haven't had time to prepare the sweet cornbread muffins at the moment.

customer_reviews.text: Love this bakeware! It cooks great, food is easy to remove and clean up is amazing!

customer_reviews.title: ... was anything but non-stick and did not clean up easy as stated
customer_reviews.text: My pan was anything but non-stick and did not clean up easy as stated. Own other items from this brand and had no problems, so I think I just have a dud pan.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice cupcake tin. I like that it ceramic and not Teflon.

customer_reviews.title: Darker in color than it looks on screen
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a lighter aqua blue based on the photo... it is DARK aqua.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite As Easy to Clean as Regular Non-Stick Pans
customer_reviews.text: I use my standard non-Stick Faberware muffin pans every week, and I've been very happy with how well they've held up with time. The "hybrid ceramic" pans are nice and heavy, but the surface isn't as easy to clean. Baked on batter requires some soaking and a little scrubbing to remove. I'm not sure these are better than a non-coated muffin pan. The color is nice, but that's not my motivation for buying cookware.
customer_reviews.author: P. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Best non-stick pans I  ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Everything slides right off! These are well constructed STEEL pans with rolled edges. NO flop or wobble! To clean I wipe with wet soapy cloth, rinse in hot water, briskly shake off water and wipe with clean cloth then air dry - only takes a few minutes per pan.Allays follow recipes' pan prep even with non-stick..ALL non-stick have issues with dishwasher washing over time - these clean so easily you don't need to put them in a dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: OFWLWC

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this pan!
customer_reviews.text: Until I got this pan, my cupcakes would constantly burn, no matter what adjustments I made. This pan is amazing! No more burnt cupcakes!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Moreland

customer_reviews.title: Works great, love the color and no grease!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these and bought two. I've made corn bread and banana nut. I love that I don't have to use tins or have to grease. The muffins just slide out. Heather

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this pan and will buy more
customer_reviews.text: I have made muffins in this several times. The lines on the bottom seems to airate the cakes and they are light and moist. I am happy with this pan and will buy more. Out with the old and in with the new.

customer_reviews.title: Best muffin pan for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and excellent non stick properties without the harmful fumes PTFE/PFOA

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and functional
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and simple to clean. I use ceramic everything since I have pet birds.

customer_reviews.text: color for all of this farberware line is not as shown online. disappointed. no idea how they will wear.

product_meta.title: Farberware purECOok Hybrid Ceramic Nonstick 12-Cup Muffin Tin / Nonstick 12-Cup Cupcake Tin - 12 Cup, Blue
product_meta.description: Color:AquaMake marvelous muffins and bake creative cupcakes with the nonstick baking performance of the Farberware PurECOok Hybrid Ceramic Nonstick Muffin and Cupcake Pan. This 12-cup muffin pan features warp-resistant steel construction and a uniquely textured interior to add even more pan stability for years of use. In addition, the quilted muffin pan surface helps airflow circulate around and under foods for beautiful, balanced baking and roasting results. And for cleanup without complication, the high-performance PFOA- and PTFE-free hybrid ceramic nonstick delivers effortless food release time after time. Whether you like to bake from a mix or from scratch, use this pan for your favorite cupcake or muffin recipe. And remember that oven cooking is so versatile that even a muffin pan transforms just a few ingredients into delicious, single-serving treats. Bake individual-sized no-crust breakfast quiches or crab cakes for lunch. Rolled pan edges protect the cake pan rim against dents and dings, and help reinforce the muffin pan’s resistance to warping. Wide bakeware handles provide plenty of room for your favorite potholders and oven mitts, and the baking pan is oven safe to 500°F.
feature_bullets: BUILT TO LAST BAKEWARE: Perfect for making cupcakes and muffins, this hybrid ceramic nonstick bakeware features long-lasting warp-resistant steel construction
EASY RELEASE: 12-cup muffin pan features PFOA-free and PTFE-free hybrid ceramic nonstick inside and out for excellent food release with easy cleanup
PERFORMANCE BAKEWARE: Muffin pan has a quilted surface for improved baking pan stability and boosted airflow for beautiful, balanced baking
EASY HANDLING: Rolled rims and wide handles provide plenty of room for potholders and oven mitts when pulling cupcakes, quiches, and treats out of the oven
HIGH HEAT BAKEWARE: 12-cup nonstick muffin pan is oven safe to 500 degrees F
NO WORRIES, CUPCAKE: Farberware muffin pan is backed by a Quality Assurance Guarantee

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
